name: Bupropion

dosing.adult_acute: IR: 100 mg BID; SR: 150 mg once daily; XL: 150 mg once daily
dosing.adult_maintenance: IR: 300 mg/day (100 mg TID); SR: 300-400 mg/day (150 mg BID); XL: 300-450 mg/day once daily
dosing.notes: Do NOT exceed 450 mg/day (XL) or 400 mg/day (SR) due to seizure risk; avoid bedtime dosing (activating)

canadian_clinical.starting_dose: XL: 150 mg once daily in morning; SR: 150 mg once daily
canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: XL: Increase to 300 mg after 3-4 days; can increase to 450 mg after 4 weeks if needed
canadian_clinical.max_dose_practice: 450 mg XL daily; ensure no single dose >150 mg (IR), >200 mg (SR), or >450 mg (XL)
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Start XL 150 mg AM; increase to 300 mg after 3-7 days; good for patients with fatigue, hypersomnia
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start XL 150 mg AM; reassess at 4 weeks before increasing; useful for SSRI augmentation or sexual dysfunction

warnings: Black box warning: Increased suicidal thinking in children/adolescents/young adults; neuropsychiatric symptoms with smoking cessation
SEIZURE RISK: Dose-dependent (0.4% at â‰¤450 mg/day); avoid in seizure disorders, eating disorders, abrupt benzodiazepine/alcohol withdrawal
Do NOT use in bulimia or anorexia nervosa (increased seizure risk)
Can cause activation, anxiety, insomnia - avoid evening doses
No sexual dysfunction or weight gain (advantageous over SSRIs)

cautions.renal: Consider dose reduction in severe impairment (CrCl <30); use caution
cautions.hepatic: Max 75 mg/day (IR), 100 mg/day (SR), or 150 mg every other day (XL) in severe hepatic cirrhosis
cautions.pregnancy: Pregnancy Category C; some data suggests no increased malformation risk
